questions.question: Considering the overall rectangular shape and the presence of three distinct panels, what is the dominant geometric form of the packaging?

Considering the uniformly dark background color in each panel, what is the overall color tone of the design?
Looking at the arrangement of data within each rectangular block, what is the format of the presented information?
Considering the texture implied by the image, how would you describe the overall surface finish of the packaging?
Based on the visual characteristics of the text, what style of font is predominantly used across the panels?
By carefully observing the image, what is the most apparent material used for the product packaging?
Observing the arrangement of text blocks, what organizational pattern is evident in each panel?
